content: {A疑惑}We... do have lil' 'uns here, right? <style=SizeSmall>I thought I saw a few young faces... or did my eyesight fail me again?</style>
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-节日-开学日-1010云果_特殊反馈

content: Today's the big day — back to school! And guess what? My fruit's ripe for the pickin'. I'm gonna pick some of the fruit and let the lil' 'uns take 'em to school to enjoy. They can share 'em with their classmates too...
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-节日-开学日-1010云果_特殊反馈

content: Gran'mama's paddies are ripe for harvest. Since I've got some time, I thought I'd go help out. This time of year, I'd usually be back in school, so Gran'mama never let me lift a finger before.
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-节日-开学日-1010云果_特殊反馈

content: She'd always say, "Oh, pumpkin! Your studyin' comes first!" But she just doesn't get it! I could've helped out with the harvest. Missing a couple of classes wouldn't have done any harm. I-I'm not saying I wanted to skip class...
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-节日-开学日-1010云果_特殊反馈
